galeshapley

Class GaleShapleyAdmission

  • java.lang.Object
    • galeshapley.GaleShapleyAdmission

  • public class GaleShapleyAdmission
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for implementing the algorithm

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GaleShapleyAdmission(java.lang.String f1, java.lang.String f2, java.lang.String f3)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allotforeign()
      Allots seats to foreign candidates
      If rank of foreign candidate good enough to substitute another candidate then he gets a seat
      No actual substitution takes place
      void fillcandidatedata(java.lang.String f2)
      function for filling data in the candidate list
      void fillprogs(java.lang.String f1)
      function for filling data in list of virtual programmes and hashmap of Institute
      void fillranklist(java.lang.String f3)
      function to feed the rank of all candidates in the hashmap
      void GSDSc()
      this function allots DS seats to candidates which are in DS list
      Candidate checked if he has been waitlisted for some program and whether his preference list been exhausted
      If none applicable for any candidate then candidate applies to next program on his preference list
      if this is applicable for every candidate algorithm terminates
      void phase1()
      this function allots seats to candidates which are in merit list
      Candidate checked if he has been waitlisted for some program and whether his preference list been exhausted
      If none applicable for any candidate then candidate applies to next program on his preference list
      if this is applicable for every candidate algorithm terminates
      int progindex(Candidate c)
      function to get index of program to which candidate will apply in the list of programs based on the category,code,PDstatus of current of candidate
      void setmeritprogs()
      function to distribute merit list to the programmes

      • GaleShapleyAdmission

        public GaleShapleyAdmission(java.lang.String f1,
                    java.lang.String f2,
                    java.lang.String f3)
        The constructor of this class takes three filenames as inputs
        All the arraylists and hashmaps are initialised to new()
        Parameters:
        f1 - Filename1
        f2 - Filename2
        f3 - Filename2 The entire algorithm runs in the constructor

    • Method Detail

      • fillprogs

        public void fillprogs(java.lang.String f1)
        function for filling data in list of virtual programmes and hashmap of Institute
        Parameters:
        f1 - Filename 1 file is read line by line, delimiter used to split line into components
        Virtual Programme called with its constructor and added to prog list
        DS qouta also initialised via this function

      • fillranklist

        public void fillranklist(java.lang.String f3)
        function to feed the rank of all candidates in the hashmap
        Parameters:
        f3 - Filename3 file is read line by line,
        delimiter used to split line into components
        Candidate ID, ranks added to ranklist

      • fillcandidatedata

        public void fillcandidatedata(java.lang.String f2)
        function for filling data in the candidate list
        Parameters:
        f2 - Filename2 file is read line by line, delimiter used to split line into components
        Candidate called with its constructor and added to studlist
        Depending on category and rank also added to meritlist and DS list

      • GSDSc

        public void GSDSc()
        this function allots DS seats to candidates which are in DS list
        Candidate checked if he has been waitlisted for some program and whether his preference list been exhausted
        If none applicable for any candidate then candidate applies to next program on his preference list
        if this is applicable for every candidate algorithm terminates

      • setmeritprogs

        public void setmeritprogs()
        function to distribute merit list to the programmes

      • progindex

        public int progindex(Candidate c)
        function to get index of program to which candidate will apply in the list of programs based on the category,code,PDstatus of current of candidate
        Parameters:
        c - Candidate for which index of program is to be found
        Returns:
        returns the index of program in program list

      • phase1

        public void phase1()
        this function allots seats to candidates which are in merit list
        Candidate checked if he has been waitlisted for some program and whether his preference list been exhausted
        If none applicable for any candidate then candidate applies to next program on his preference list
        if this is applicable for every candidate algorithm terminates

      • allotforeign

        public void allotforeign()
        Allots seats to foreign candidates
        If rank of foreign candidate good enough to substitute another candidate then he gets a seat
        No actual substitution takes place
